did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Pamphlets, printed material and maps concerning Garden City.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Garden City, Nassau County, Long Island, New York, was founded in 1869 as a planned community. By 1876, A.T. Stewart had founded and built the village on a portion of his tract at Hempstead Plains. Garden City was incorporated in 1919.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Pamphlets, printed material and maps concerning Garden City.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Garden City (N.Y.) city planning records, #2802. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box and mapcase folder. Online guide unavailable.
